metadata.name: Suspicious Usage Of ShellExec_RunDLL
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious usage of the ShellExec_RunDLL function to launch other commands as seen in the the raspberry-robin attack

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shellexec_rundll')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\desktop\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('comspec')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('iex')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('msiexec')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('odbcconf')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('regsvr32'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious usage of the ShellExec_RunDLL function to launch other commands as seen in the the raspberry-robin attack
